column1: Documentation of the configuration database in detail

column4: Description
ID of the timestep, must start with 1 and must be numbered consecutively
UTC time stamp of the beginning of the time step in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Local time stamp of the beginning of the time step in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Time zone name of the local time as text (might change e.g. through daylight saving time)
Name of the simulation attribute, see table overview for details on required keys
Value of the simulation attribute
ID of the substation, may start with 1 and may be numbered consecutively (not mandatory anymore)
Name of the substation
ID of the control unit, may start with 1 and may be numbered consecutively (not mandatory anymore)
ID of the substation to which this control unit is connected to [Foreign key]
ID of the location where the control unit is located at [Foreign key]
Holds the value 1, iff there is a wallbox connected to this control unit
ID of the measurement unit, may start with 1 and may be numbered consecutively (not mandatory anymore)
ID of the control unit to which this measruement unit is assigned [Foreign key]
Name of the meter point, i.e. MPRN (Meter Point Reference Number in UK) or MELO (Meter Location Number in Germany)
Holds the value 1, iff this measurement unit shows a demand at least at one point in the simulation time
Holds the value 1, iff this measurement unit shows a feedin at least at one point in the simulation time
Holds the value 1, iff a residential PV installation is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff an open-space PV installation is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a battery is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a heat pump is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a CHP is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
ID of the location where the measurement unit is located at [Foreign key]
Holds the value 1, iff a wind farm is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a bio mass power plant is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a residential EV charging station is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a public EV charging station is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
The time step for which the dataset is valid [Foreign key]
The normalized feed-in value at the given timestep
The orientation of the given feedin value
If there are more time series for one orientation, this number gives the id (starting with 0) of the time series with the same direction
The orientation
Number of time series for the given orientation
The time step for which the dataset is valid [Foreign key]
The normalized feed-in value at the given timestep
The time step for which the dataset is valid [Foreign key]
The normalized demand value of the heat pump time series; normalization takes place on a yearly level to a demand sum of 1000 kWh / a
The index of the heat pump time series (important, if there is more than one time series)
ID of the location (starting with 0)
Number of buildings (for which geodata is available)
Holds the value 1, iff the location holds a residential building, and can thus be regarded as residential location
The volume of the (biggest) building on the given location - used for aproximating the heat demand if no heat demand is given in table heat_demand_per_location
ID of the location
Mean heat demand of the location in kWh per year / mean over all regarded years
ID of the referenced location [Foreign key]
Area of the roof section in square meter
The orientation of the given roof section; for every orientation there has to exist a correspoding time series in the tabel 'global_profiles_pv'
ID of the timestep, must start with 1 and must be numbered consecutively
Residual grid load in kW during time step TimestepID
ID of the timestep, must have the same alignment as time_indices.TimestepID
CO2eq. emissions of one kWh of electiricty that is taken from the transmission grid
ID of the timestep, must have the same alignment as time_indices.TimestepID
The local (dynamic) price for residential households for a dynamic tariff in ct/kWh
The (dynamic) price at the spot market (without vat or taxes) in ct/kWh
